get.summary: Returns a list of all Historical Logs for a specified object-type.
get.description: Returns a list of all Historical Logs for a specified object-type. Returns all values for all logs of the specified object-type when no filter parameters are provided. For filtering syntax see here.

parameters.name: ObjectType
parameters.description: The object-type to retrieve logs for. Object-type is written in lowercase, plural format. E.g. deployments, documents, labels, pods, projects, schemas.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Specifies what objects should be retrieved based on provided key-values. 
Multiple key-values can be specified with the ampersand-delimited format. Eg. To list all objects created by 'UNKNOWN USER': 'q=createdBy=UNKNOWN USER', and to list all objects created by 'UNKNOWN USER' and created on 1st January, 1970: 'q=createdBy=UNKNOWN USER&createdAt=1970-01-01'

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specifies what key-values associated with the retrieved objects that you want to receive. 
Multiple key-values can be retrieved through filtering keys with the comma-delimited format. Eg. For the created by value alone: 'fields=createdBy', and for the created by and created at values: 'fields=createdBy,createdAt'

422.description:
Possible Messages:
* Logs are not available for object-type: {ObjectType}. Try one of: deployments, documents, groups, labels, pods, projects, schemas.
* Error while attempting to retrieve {ObjectType} Logs.
* Improperly structured query. Make sure to use ?q=<key>=<value> syntax

get.summary: Returns the Log Document for a specified object-types ID.
get.description: Returns a Historical Log for the object-type with the specified ID value (if it exists).

parameters.name: ObjectType
parameters.description: The object-type to retrieve logs for. Object-type is written in lowercase, plural format. E.g. deployments, documents, labels, pods, projects, schemas.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the object-type to retrieve the log for.

404.description: A Log for a {ObjectType} with that ID does not exist.

422.description: Error while attempting to retrieve Log for specified {ObjectType} ID.
